attributes.action: sack elaine and make blocking websites with games illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elaine is the it technician / antichrist at our school. SHE SHOULD BE SACKED. she is evil. "mwa ha ha" - says Elaine. she blocks our precious websites eg www.englishbanana.com What does she think is wrong with it????

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
